p: The Diplonychus rusticus adults were collected in the field and maintained in glass tanks (60 cm long × 50 cm wide) containing water at 25 °C with a water depth of 20 cm. The essential oils were tested at concentrations of 200, 150, 100, 75, 50, and 25 μg/mL. Four replicates were performed for each concentration. Twenty D. rusticus adults were introduced into each solution. The non-target organism was observed for mortality after 24 h and 48 h exposure.
